item.description:
I am organizing a game night in North Beverly. This venue was chosen for ease of parking and the likelihood of available table space on a Tuesday. Panera Bread is open until 9:00 p.m.

I will be bringing some new games I would like to play including Through the Desert and Cartegena.  I will also bring Fluxx, Guillotine, Ra, Torres, Call My Bluff, Citadels and a few two- player games (Lost Cities and Mystery Rummy 1). While I prefer to play strategy or card games, I welcome all to bring your favorite game. After some dinner conversation, we will break up into smaller groups based on interest and the number of players each game can accommodate.    

I do request that when we hold Meetups in food or drink establishments that everyone in attendance order at least one item or beverage.
item.how_to_find_us: I will try to get there early to section off an area in the back of restaurant.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: "Across the Bridge" Game Night
